messages.title: Strong Leadership
messages.content: A CLEAR ECONOMIC PLAN. A BETTER, MORE SECURE FUTURE.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to see health services at the PRH expand further & safeguard Telford’s A&E Unit.
Stand up for the Armed Forces, for military veterans, and local defence jobs.
Ensure local schools & colleges get additional support for education & training courses.
Commit to tax cuts for workers and savers, work towards more jobs and new businesses.
Fight to stop Councils building on greenfield land & work towards more brownfield development.

issues.economy: Tax cuts for workers and savers, deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses.
issues.environment: Fight to stop Councils building on greenfield land & work towards more brownfield development.
issues.health: Campaign to see health services at the PRH expand further & safeguard Telford’s A&E Unit.

housing.content: Fight to stop Councils building on greenfield land & work towards more brownfield development.

leaflet.personalStatement: Hardworking and lives locally. Speaks up on local & national issues – fearlessly. Independent-minded & puts his constituents interests before his own political advancement.

politicalExperience.achievements: Attended a state school, is self made & attended both the University of Life and University. A champion of local services – both in the public and private sectors.
